description:
Window is not resizeable in 18.04 BB. 
Controls are there but opaque and overlapped one atop of the other and unusable.

It is a good program.
But I think with some minor improvements, it will look better:
1) Audio output setting option.
2) Allowing to resize the program window would greatly help people who have laptops or second screen.

Ubuntu 19.10
summary: It's a good program, but it needs some improvements

description: No option to set audio output besides through a server, which is not the best idea.
